caption.title: Quantitative analysis of synaptic appositions on the proximal and distal dendrites of GnRH neurons in diestrus female mice (N = 4).
caption.p: For proximal dendrites, 60 µm of dendrite was measure in each case, whereas 15 µm lengths were examined for distal dendrites.

tr.td: Percentage of dendrites with synaptophysin contact
No. of synaptophysin contacts with GnRH dendrite
Percentage of dendrites with synaptophysin contact
No. of synaptophysin contacts with GnRH dendrite
